content: meet the market day shawlette - the last in my market day series perfect for keeping warm on cool fall days and making a statement with its simply repeating pattern and a pretty picot border this pattern is perfect for new crocheters who have mastered the basic stitches and want a small pattern to try finished measurements tip to tip - 43 depth 20 yarn 100 grams of fingering weight yarn yardage 437 yards needles g techniques chain single double and half-double_crochet picot slip stitches
